to arrive at a finding that the Respondent has not acted carefully, which is breach
of a term of his contract of employment. In the circumstances, Court will not arrive
at a finding contrary to that of the learned President of the Labour Tribunal, in the
absence of a finding that is perverse to the evidence adduced before the Labour
Tribunal by the Appellant and the Respondent.
